short_summary: Request for Proposal for Application/Software Architect and Courseware Developer services for Microsoft Project Online Implementation
description: The _____ requires the services of one Application/Software Architect and one Courseware Developer to help in the Microsoft Project Online implementation services and related activities.
full_summary:
===============

### Tender Announcement

**Project Title** 
----------------

Project Management Solution

**Contracting Entity**
-----------------------

* Name: Canadian Institutes of Health Research
* Address: 160 Elgin Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0W9, Canada

**Tender Details**
------------------

* **RFP Reference Number**: PW-22-01012920
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: 182423-TBIPS-RFP-CIHR
* **Publication Date**: November 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 22, 2022, 13:00 Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

**Tender Requirements**
-------------------------

The Canadian Institutes of Health Research are seeking the professional services of one Application/Software Architect (Level 3) and one Courseware Developer (Level 2) to assist in the Microsoft Project Online implementation services and related activities for the "Project Management Solution" project.

**Scope of Work**
------------------

The selected contractor will be responsible for assisting in the design, development, and implementation of the Microsoft Project Online solution, as well as related activities such as project planning, configuration, and training.

**Selection Criteria**
------------------------

The selection criteria for this tender are outlined in the attached Request for Proposal (RFP) documents. Interested bidders must submit a comprehensive proposal that meets the specified requirements.

**Attachments**
---------------

The tender documents, including the RFP and supporting documentation, can be downloaded from the following links:

* **English**: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/08/d850fbed43907d156f807258f9b9fa94/182423-tbips-npp-english.pdf)
* **French**: [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/08/08a59484dd36e697261d2907acb01450/182423-tbips-npp-french.pdf)

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

For further information, please contact:

* Stephanie Lamoureux
* Contracting Officer
* Canadian Institutes of Health Research
* Phone: 343-552-2845
* Email: [stephanie.lamoureux@cihr-irsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.lamoureux
